title: Palatino nova
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Palatino nova**

Typeface family in [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype)'s [Platinum Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Platinum%20Collection) designed 2005 by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf) and [Akira Kobayashi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Akira%20Kobayashi).

See [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino) for more information.

View the [Palatino nova Typeface online at Linotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101053633/http:/www.linotype.com/6-2567-6/palatinonova.html).
author: dan_reynolds
